welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Saint-Genis-Pouilly! This charming city is known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that it has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Geneve-cointrin Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Geneve-cointrin Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
